attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned want you to ensure that Berwick Maternity Unit continues to allow mothers within Berwick upon Tweed and the surrounding area to have their birthing experience where they want it.

Berwick Mothers do NOT want to have to travel nearly 60 miles to deliver their babies when there is a fully stocked and excellently staffed unit on their doorstep.

Further more we the undersigned want our maternity unit to be improved to allow "High risk" births to place their.

Stop taking away our services and our choices.
